title: Drawing, "Lady Esther Yacht : Bedroom Furniture", 1934–35
inscribed: Inscribed in graphite at lower left with dimensions
description: Drawing for bedroom furniture on Lady Esther Yacht. Arrangement at left of room is double-bed with rounded corners and no feet. Long cylindrical pillow at head of bed. Bed set into middle of cabinet/drawer unit, with horizontal and tubular lighting fixture to left and right of bed affixed to cabinet. Cabinet to left of bed is curved at far left side; cabinet door on curved side and three small drawers closest to bed. Three small drawers on right side of bed, rectangular in overall shape with no curved end. Doorway at far left on left wall. On right wall are two square windows with blinds. Rough sketches of furniture in lower and right margins of paper.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Lady Esther Yacht : Bedroom Furniture", 1934–35.
1934–35. Graphite on tracing paper. Gift of Donald Deskey. 1975-11-305-7.
